alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Maury (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 5:37PM CST until February 19 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Giles, Lawrence, Marshall and Maury. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 537 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lawrenceburg, Pulaski, Loretto, Summertown, Ardmore, Cornersville, St. Joseph, Elkton, Minor Hill, Ethridge, Lynnville, Goodspring, Leoma, Prospect, Henryville, Frankewing, Westpoint and Iron City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
